page.title: 11New Housing Developments
page.content: Upper Hill Park Estate is situated to the south of the grid reference, there is a residential area, fairly densely populated.It is made up of several parts _ Hill Park ; Upper Hill Park,Lady Park and Seascape. Having made a survey of the area,we found that Lady Park,situated at the top of the estate on high ground is made up of mainly detatched bungalows with a few houses. Upper Hill Park and Seascape also consists of a mixture of bungalows and houses. At the end of the Croft is now a modern block of flats totally unrelated to the Victorian houses.
